id: ExportMyPDF | Create PDFs in bulk in Notion
name: ExportMyPDF | Create PDFs in bulk in Notion
description: Bulk PDF Generator for NotionGenerate PDF Documents in bulk using a Notion DatabaseFeaturesSeamless PDF GenerationExportMyPDF is a simple yet powerful platform that helps you create and manage PDF generation directly from Notion.It's quick and easy to export pdf documents!1. Notion IntegrationEasily link Notion pages by sharing your page URL. Streamline setup and get started fast.2. Single PDF GenerationCreate Single PDF by sharing your Notion Page URL with ExportMyPDF and generating PDF.2. Bulk
features: Add Notion Page Share URLShare Notion Page URL and copy the page url and paste it in the Notion Page URL field.; Load Notion PageClick on Load Notion Page to load the Notion Page.Note: Notion Page must be shared and made public before adding in PDFOutput.; Click Generate PDFClickGenerate PDFto generate the Notion Page as a PDF.; Add Notion Page Share URLShare Notion Page URL and copy the page url and paste it in the Notion Page URL field.; Load Notion PageClick on Load Notion Page to load the Notion Page.Note: Notion Page must be shared and made public before adding in PDFOutput.; Add Notion Database Share URLShare Notion Database URL and copy the database url and paste it in the Notion Database URL field.; Load Notion DatabaseClick on Load Notion Database to load the Notion Database.Note: Notion Database must be shared and made public before adding in PDFOutput.; Set the PDF File NameSet the PDF File name from the dropdown of PDF File names shown in the dropdown.; Click Generate PDFClickGenerate PDFto generate the Notion Database as a PDF.
